sqlp.sql_template: set pagesize 100 line 200 SELECT * FROM ( SELECT '%SCHEMA_NAME%.REF_FX' %DB_CONNECTOR%, COUNT(*) FROM %SCHEMA_NAME%.REF_FX UNION ALL SELECT '%SCHEMA_NAME%.REF_MTM', COUNT(*) FROM %SCHEMA_NAME%.REF_MTM UNION ALL SELECT '%SCHEMA_NAME%.REF_SECURE', COUNT(*) FROM %SCHEMA_NAME%.REF_SECURE UNION ALL SELECT '%SCHEMA_NAME%.REF_ESALES', COUNT(*) FROM %SCHEMA_NAME%.REF_ESALES UNION ALL SELECT '%SCHEMA_NAME%.REF_MNGD_SEG_HIER', COUNT(*) FROM %SCHEMA_NAME%.REF_MNGD_SEG_HIER UNION ALL SELECT '%SCHEMA_NAME%.REF_MNGD_SEG_XREF',COUNT(*) FROM %SCHEMA_NAME%.REF_MNGD_SEG_XREF UNION ALL SELECT '%SCHEMA_NAME%.MAN_REF_MKT_OF_SETL', COUNT(*) FROM %SCHEMA_NAME%.MAN_REF_MKT_OF_SETL UNION ALL SELECT '%SCHEMA_NAME%.MAN_REF_LGL_ENTY_DATA', COUNT(*) FROM %SCHEMA_NAME%.MAN_REF_LGL_ENTY_DATA UNION ALL SELECT '%SCHEMA_NAME%.MAN_REF_LGL_ENTY_XREF', COUNT(*) FROM %SCHEMA_NAME%.MAN_REF_LGL_ENTY_XREF UNION ALL SELECT '%SCHEMA_NAME%.MAN_REF_TRAN_TYP', COUNT(*) FROM %SCHEMA_NAME%.MAN_REF_TRAN_TYP UNION ALL SELECT '%SCHEMA_NAME%.MAN_REF_ASET_LVL_DATA', COUNT(*) FROM %SCHEMA_NAME%.MAN_REF_ASET_LVL_DATA UNION ALL SELECT '%SCHEMA_NAME%.MAN_REF_PLAT_CLIENTS', COUNT(*) FROM %SCHEMA_NAME%.MAN_REF_PLAT_CLIENTS UNION ALL SELECT '%SCHEMA_NAME%.MAN_REF_OPS_OWN_HIER', COUNT(*) FROM %SCHEMA_NAME%.MAN_REF_OPS_OWN_HIER UNION ALL SELECT '%SCHEMA_NAME%.MAN_REF_FIRM_TMS', COUNT(*) FROM %SCHEMA_NAME%.MAN_REF_FIRM_TMS UNION ALL SELECT '%SCHEMA_NAME%.MAN_REF_FIRM_ETPL', COUNT(*) FROM %SCHEMA_NAME%.MAN_REF_FIRM_ETPL UNION ALL SELECT '%SCHEMA_NAME%.MAN_REF_MARKETSIDE_MAPNG', COUNT(*) FROM %SCHEMA_NAME%.MAN_REF_MARKETSIDE_MAPNG UNION ALL SELECT '%SCHEMA_NAME%.MAN_REF_SOEID_MAPNG', COUNT(*) FROM %SCHEMA_NAME%.MAN_REF_SOEID_MAPNG UNION ALL SELECT '%SCHEMA_NAME%.MAN_REF_SOLAR', COUNT(*) FROM %SCHEMA_NAME%.MAN_REF_SOLAR UNION ALL SELECT '%SCHEMA_NAME%.MAN_REF_STGY_TO_DESK', COUNT(*) FROM %SCHEMA_NAME%.MAN_REF_STGY_TO_DESK ) ORDER BY 1;
